headline: Is Carrier Global Now an Opportunity After Portfolio Shift Toward Climate Control Solutions?
summary: Wondering if Carrier Global is quietly turning into a value opportunity, or if the recent drop is a warning sign? Let us unpack what the current price is really saying about future returns. The stock has slipped about 1.9% over the last week and 1.4% over the last month, adding to a tough year with a 23.3% year-to-date and 20.8% one-year decline, even though the 3-year and 5-year gains of 29.3% and 46.5% show the longer term story is still positive. Recent headlines have focused on Carrier...
